means: （在想像中）重新过…的生活，再经历( relive的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: There is no point in reliving the past.
sentence.Network_cn: 回味过去没有任何意义。

sentence.Network_en: The reliving of a strong emotion can be therapeutic.
sentence.Network_cn: 对先前强烈感情的重新体验可能具有治疗作用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: relive 重新生活, reliving 再生复苏, reliveran 灭吐灵

list.abs: You can laugh againagain , relive those great moments ., 你能一笑再笑 , 重温那些美好时刻.
effects of reliving itch and anti - inflammatory and bacteriostasis of compound tujing tincture ., 复方土荆酊剂抑菌 , 抗炎止痒作用研究.
relive your memories in richer detail .重温您的回忆，在丰富的细节。
chain reaction 链锁反应chain reliver 弃链器Chain right ahead! 锚链正前!

entry.tran: （在记忆或想象中）再次体验，回味，重温
entry.def: If you relive something that has happened to you in the past, you remember it and imagine that you are experiencing it again.

example.ex: There is no point in reliving the past...
example.tran: 回味过去没有任何意义。

example.ex: Last night he relived his terrifying ordeal.
example.tran: 昨夜他又一次体验了那种可怕的折磨。

means.word_mean: 1. a recurrence of a prior experience;

sentences.sentence: "the reliving of a strong emotion can be therapeutic"

auth_sentence.content: There's catharsis in this: I'm reliving trauma.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's catharsis in this: I'm reliving trauma.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's catharsis in this: I'm reliving trauma.

auth_sentence.content: Personally it is reliving to be able to check each new imbalance in retrospect.
auth_sentence.res_content: Personally it is reliving to be able to check each new imbalance in retrospect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Personally it is reliving to be able to check each new imbalance in retrospect.

auth_sentence.content: Some people experience flashbacks, reliving a bad trip weeks or even months after it happened.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some people experience flashbacks, reliving a bad trip weeks or even months after it happened.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some people experience flashbacks, reliving a bad trip weeks or even months after it happened.
